at.fhjoanneum.android.sqlite

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhjoanneum.android.sqlite.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Cocktail Classics Cocktail Classics is an app which shows a big selection of classical cocktails. Every cocktail is something special and can be mixed very easily because the recipe, the ingredients and a picture is shown for every cocktail. You can rate your favorite cocktails and sort them like you want. If there is something to add in the recipe you can easily take a note for every cocktail and you can also change the picture if you prefer your own pictures. This is our main activity. Here the whole database will be set up if necessary and the data gets loaded into the database. Also the first Fragment gets shown, which is the cocktail list fragment where the whole list of cocktails gets shown. The adapter will create the navigation drawer which is needed to change the content of the fragments.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Manuela Mayer, Kahmann Sebastian, Egger Andreas, Cemi Rrahel

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        We change to the CocktailListFragment from the CocktailDetailFragment. If we are in one of the main fragments which are the CocktailListFragment, CocktailBarFragment, CocktailShoppinglistFragment, ImpressumFragment or CocktailAlcoholLevelCalculator, we show the quit dialog.

      • onQuitDialog

        public void onQuitDialog()
        Changes to the QuitDialogFragment which shows us the quit dialog. We do not use an predefined dialog because the layout would not fit to our app layout

      • onItemClick
